item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Custom Widgets
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded: This theme comes with following custom widgets: social links, contact form, flickr, twitter, email subscribe: FeedBurner & MailChimp, recent posts, popular posts, testimonials.

item.title: Custom Post Types
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
In addition to standart post type, this theme has 3 custom posts types: for portfolio, slideshow and testimonials.

You can learn about post types at official WordPress website: https://codex.wordpress.org/Post_Types

item.title: Custom background slideshow, image or color for each page/post
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
Our theme comes with following options for page or post background
[th_list color="#b8bf37" list_type="th_list_simple" ]
  • Use global settings - you can set background settings in theme options and use them for all pages and posts.
  • Custom slideshow - you can choose to show different background slideshow for any page or post you need.
  • Image - you can show different background images for any page or post you need.
  • Disable - or you can disable image/slideshow from background so only color will be displayed.
[/th_list]

Here is a few examples

item.title: Unique Blog & Portfolio listing design
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
Blog

Blog Carousel Style - for those who like to provide information elegant. Classic - allows you to adjust page layout. You can make your blog page to cover 1/3, 1/2 (2/3 with sidebar) or full width.

Portfolio

Portfolio comes as custom post type with its own settings as for pages and for posts. Same as blog, portfolio comes in different styles: Carousel - may be used in completely different purposes. I.e. as a restaurant menu, hotel rooms showcase, photographer or designer portfolio, list of products and many more. You can set any size for portfolio carousel thumbnails. Portfolio shortcodes comes with 1, 2, 3 or 4, columns per page. * Thumnbnails are scaleable and depends on page layout settings: 1/3, 1/2 and full width. Portfolio shortcodes can be sortable ( using isotop ) or with pagination.

item.title: Custom Thumbnail Sizes
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded: Our theme comes with custom settings for portfolio carousel thumbnails. You can easily set any size with any proportion for each page with carousel.

item.title: Fancy 3d Effect for Sidebar
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
Sidebars for posts comes with awesome 3d animation when you opening post. It will help to make an unforgettable experience for your website visitors!

[button type="btn_large" url="http://milano.themoholics.com/v1/post-with-sidebar-2/" target="" button_color_fon="#b8bf37" hover_color="#ffffff" text_color="#ffffff" text_color_hover="#000000" ]You can check it on any post.[/button]

item.title: Background Audio Support
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
Set sounds for different elements of the website or even background music! However, if you don't need sounds, you can easily disable them.

If you navigate to the other page it will continue to play from the same position, instead of starting over...

item.title: Responsive & Retina ready
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
TRULY RESPONSIVE

Unlike the most of other website it is not just responsive but usable on devices. We did our best to make sure that visitors of your website will be able to browse and read all of the website content . And also will have the pleasure and unforgettable experience after visiting your site

item.title: Custom Color Settings for each page/post
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
[one_half]



Milano comes with Huge amount of color options to give you full control over your theme look! Change colors starting from navigation menu to backgrounds and content colors separately for each page/post. [/one_half] [one_half last=last] [/one_half] [clear]

item.title: Translation Ready
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
[one_half] [/one_half] [one_half last=last]


Make it multilingual with WPML! This theme is ready to be translated in other languages than English. It include a .POT file, from which can be easily created .po/.mo files to the language you need. [/one_half] [clear]

item.title: Contact Form Builder
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
You can create any form you need with our contact form shortcode builder!
To add contact form to your page simply click on contact form shortcode button, that can be found integrated in default editor panel in visual mode. After you click popup with builder will apper where you can add/remove different fields and set your email.

item.title: One Click Install
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
You can install our theme with almost the same look as on preview in just a couple of clicks!


* Images from preview are not included

item.title: Custom CSS Styles
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
YOU CAN ADD CUSTOM CSS RULES FROM ADMIN PANEL
It allows you to change theme look without editing core theme files. And what is important, CSS rules are stored in database and will be saved after theme update.

item.title: Help Forum & Free Updates
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded: If you encounter any problems or have questions once you purchased the theme feel free to drop us a notice at http://help.themoholics.com

item.title: Layouts
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
Our theme comes with different layout options for each page/post, such as: one third, one half or full width content.

item.title: Custom Slideshow with Unique Transition
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
You will love our amazing slideshow with elegant, unique custom transition, intro slide, custom colors for each slide, touch navigation and lots of various settings
[one_third] [/one_third] [two_third last=last]

[th_list color="#b8bf37" list_type="th_list_simple" ]
  • Custom Transition
  • Custom size for slideshow thumbnails
  • Scale settings for slideshow images
  • Touch navigation
  • Slide with intro
  • Custom color settings for each slide
  • Html content for slides
  • Options to hide controls & thumbnails
  • Top or bottom timeline
  • Preloader, Autoplay, Shuffle...
[/th_list] [/two_third]

item.title: Stylish Navigation
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
We made this stylish, full screen floating navigation menu for those who would like to welcome their customers an extraordinary way.

[th_list color="#b8bf37" list_type="th_list_simple" ]
  • Move your mouse to the left side of the screen and navigation menu will appear with amazing parallax effect on content area.
  • Planning to make a long menu with many pages? No problem! You’ll be able to scroll it easiliy by moving mouse to top or bottom...
  • At the first load menu will apper automatically to make themselves known.
[/th_list]

item.title: Advanced Typography
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded:
[one_half] [/one_half] [one_half last=last]
Our theme comes with over 600 integrated google fonts, that you can set for titles and navigation menu.
Also you can choose Font Familiy for content text from list of standart fonts and set font style.
[/one_half]

item.title: reserv1
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded: Excellent food and value for the bookatable deal. Would definitely go back, with or without the deal. Only comment is far too noisy, eventhough we asked them to turn the music down slightly. Wouldn't recommend for an 'intimate' evening . Otherwise a great night out.

item.title: reserv2
item.dc:creator: milanowp
item.content:encoded: Was exactly as I expected, bit disappointing not to be sat by the window. Food was good and I would recommend it. Also I accept that when dining in these upmarket restaurants it will be expensive but I do begrudge paying £4.50 for still water
